About Me

Hi, I’m G. Carvalho, a high school student passionate about technology, competitive mathematics, and freelancing.

I’m diving into full-stack web development, multimedia design, and exploring online business ventures like affiliate marketing and dropshipping.

This blog is where I share my journey, projects, and insights. As a self-taught developer with a knack for problem-solving—honed through winning gold and silver medals at a Brazilian Math Olympiad (OBMEP) — I’m excited to create and share projects that make an impact.
